message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with codes for distributed storage systems, which are typically studied in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Distributed Computing (cs.DC) sub-categories. The use of Minimum Bandwidth Regenerating (MBR) and Minimum Storage Regenerating (MSR) codes suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the Distributed Systems (cs.DS) sub-category. The low field-size requirement of the code constructions may make the paper relevant to the Signal Processing (cs.SI) sub-category. Finally, the use of optimal rate and minimum-distance criteria suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-category.
